home_job: React JS and React Native developer
about_desc: Experienced React JS and React Native Developer with four years of expertise in building robust web and mobile applications using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack. Proficient in frontend development with React.js and React Native, including state management with Redux. Skilled in backend development with Node.js and Express.js, coupled with MongoDB for database management. Proven track record of delivering high-quality, scalable solutions while adhering to best practices and architectural patterns. Passionate about leveraging MERN architecture to create seamless user experiences across web and mobile platforms.
experience_1_overview: Developing websites with MERN stack and managing the whole lifecycle of the web.
